General.Name: Ci&T Inc
General.Description: CI&T Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides strategy, design, and software engineering services worldwide. It is also involved in the development of customizable software through the implementation of software solutions, including machine learning, artificial intelligence, analytics, cloud migration, and mobility technologies. CI&T Inc. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Campinas, Brazil.
General.Address: Estrada Giuseppina Vianelli de Napoli, 1455, Campinas, SP, Brazil, 13086-530
